general.footer: If you believe that you are having a medical emergency, please dial 911 or go to the nearest emergency room.

getReady.body1: This process allows you to complete registration in advance, from the comfort of home.
getReady.body2: While your check-in should not be viewed as an appointment, we make every effort to see patients as close to the time selected as possible.
getReady.body3: Please click on "Continue" to proceed to a page where you will enter your phone number. We'll verify if we have your information already. If we do, we will pre-fill your past information for a faster booking.
getReady.subtitle: Booking your check-in saves you time!
getReady.title: Get ready for your visit

paperworkPages.For eligible visits, you can (optionally: For eligible visits, you can (optionally) be seen by a virtual provider via an iPad, partnered with our in-office nursing/support team. These visits feature all our typical office care, including: lab testing, vital signs, throat/ear exams, medications, school notes, prescriptions, injury care, and more!
paperworkPages.Would you be interested in seeing a virt: Would you be interested in seeing a virtual provider (if it's an option) to save time for this visit?
paperworkPages.Pronoun responses are kept confidential: Pronoun responses are kept confidential in our system and are used to help us best respect how our patients (up to age 26) wish to be addressed.

paperworkPages.A responsible party is the individual re: A responsible party is the individual responsible for the visit's financial obligations. If the patient is not their own responsible party (most common), then the responsible party must be the patient's legal guardian or legal designee.

officeClosed.today: So sorry! Due to unforeseen circumstances, this office is closed today. Check out our convenient telemedicine option to connect with a {{PROJECT_NAME}} expert from the comfort of home OR click the 'tomorrow' button to view available slots for tomorrow.

thanks.body1: Your check-in time is booked for:
thanks.body2: Proceed below for paperwork. Completing prior to arrival will save time and ensure the best check-in experience.

thanks.body5: Please click the "Proceed to paperwork" button above to complete your paperwork prior to your visit. If this is not completed in advance, your care may be delayed.
thanks.body8: If not completed, your care may be delayed.
